title: Re: Commander Keen Community Project
content:
There have been group projects by poeple, but so far 90% of them have all failed.

As far as the ENTIRE forum... no, it's never been done before.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Commander Keen Community Project
content:
